    1: import pytest
    2: 
    3: jinja2 = pytest.importorskip("jinja2")
    4: 
    5: from pandas import (
    6:     DataFrame,
    7:     MultiIndex,
    8: )
    9: 
   10: from pandas.io.formats.style import Styler
   11: 
   12: 
   13: @pytest.fixture
   14: def df():
   15:     return DataFrame(
   16:         data=[[0, -0.609], [1, -1.228]],
   17:         columns=["A", "B"],
   18:         index=["x", "y"],
   19:     )
   20: 
   21: 
   22: @pytest.fixture
   23: def styler(df):
   24:     return Styler(df, uuid_len=0)
   25: 
   26: 
   27: def test_concat_bad_columns(styler):
   28:     msg = "`other.data` must have same columns as `Styler.data"
   29:     with pytest.raises(ValueError, match=msg):
   30:         styler.concat(DataFrame([[1, 2]]).style)
   31: 
   32: 
   33: def test_concat_bad_type(styler):
   34:     msg = "`other` must be of type `Styler`"
   35:     with pytest.raises(TypeError, match=msg):
   36:         styler.concat(DataFrame([[1, 2]]))
   37: 
   38: 
   39: def test_concat_bad_index_levels(styler, df):
   40:     df = df.copy()
   41:     df.index = MultiIndex.from_tuples([(0, 0), (1, 1)])
   42:     msg = "number of index levels must be same in `other`"
   43:     with pytest.raises(ValueError, match=msg):
   44:         styler.concat(df.style)
